=Installation=

Before using LALP compiler you need to install the following libraries:

  * [http://jung.sourceforge.net/ JUNG]
  * [http://acs.lbl.gov/software/colt/ Colt]
  * [http://commons.apache.org/collections/ Commons Collections]

==Setting Environment Variables==

===Unix Systems===
{{{
export LALP_HOME=/path/to/lalp
export PATH=$LALP_HOME:$PATH
}}}

===Windows Systems===
{{{
set LALP_HOME=c:\path\to\lalp
set PATH=%LALP_HOME%;%PATH%
}}}
